description: Also known as Benzaiten no Kaoru. Member of the http://anidb.net/ch17072 [Freeter Sentai Shinobi 5], a mercenary ninja group for hire. Seen operating a flower shop in Episode 97, where Kagura posing as mini-Gintoki crashed the scooter into her shop, damaging the flower-petal birthday present that was planned secretly for Michiko by her husband. As a ninja she uses the flower pollen to paralyze her opponents.
name: Wakikaoru
